snippet.title: Batman: Return of the Joker (Sunsoft, 1991) - NES Gameplay
snippet.description:
The Joker lives again in this Batman action game. The Joker has somehow managed to escape from the asylum once again, and Batman must defeat him to restore peace to Gotham City. Batman's weapons include bat-a-rangs and explosive punching power. There are 4 stages that take place in the sewer, a machine shop, on a train, and in a cave. This game is one of the few Batman games that was not based directly on a movie or television series.

Known on Famicom as: Dynamite Batman 

NES Relatives: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fBkdrjLF-Dg
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=seQGoF4jqDU


NESGUIDE ARCHIVE INFO

The original NES gameplay archive, est 2007 includes gameplay captures from all commercial releases from the US market with a few extras (like famicom releases) just for fun. As of Dec 2024, I've resumed efforts to update some of the older (some 360p) videos with higher-def captures. Text updates will be posted to BlueSky (which doesn't require an account to view). Please follow there (or just bookmark the url) if you're interested!

https://bsky.app/profile/nesguide.com
